name: .SNB File Extension
summary: Learn about .SNB files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open SNB files in the Samsung Notes app on your Samsung device. In Windows, you can convert SNB files to PDF files on your computer using snbopen. You can also open SNB files in Windows or macOS by replacing the ".snb" extension with ".zip" to create a .ZIP file. You can then extract the contents with a Zip decompression program, such as Microsoft File Explorer, Corel WinZip, or Apple Archive Utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
